haikus.title: Techs connect in a single try
haikus.content:
A true tech connects
to 15454 (fifteen-four-fifty-four)
in a single try

haikus.title: Firmware upgrades
haikus.content:
Celebrate early:
What could possibly go wrong
with firmware upgrades?

haikus.title: Lacerations
haikus.content:
Moving heavy things
like multicouplers beget
a laceration.

haikus.title: Weekend
haikus.content:
Approaching weekend:
Thirty more minutes to go.
Imminent freedom!

haikus.title: Missing order number
Mandatory CBT
haikus.content:
As an FYI,
Vital issues CBT
is mandatory.

haikus.title: Buzzwords
